channel.title: (508) making unsoported items work?
channel.description: ok i did ::item 13614 1 (that runecrafter robe) now how do i make it so i can wear the blasted thing because i keep getting unsupported item (I'm new to 508) can somebody help me please

item.title: (508) making unsoported items work?
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

ok go inot packets, lok for equipment.java add the name of the robes in the right slots in there save it then go inot the bin, data, items, item.cfg, add it in there and then save it, complie it, then you have it added in. if the item is already in the cfg file then just put it in the right slot, ( this is for armour and clothes, NOT weapons) for weapons u need playerweapons.java and add in the stances to, rune, walk, stand, atk, def, all that good stuff in addition to the first part i just said.

hope that cleared things up a bit, if not pm me and i wil help you out more.

Read full topic
